name: SWAP (itch)
description:
A thousand feet below the surface of the earth, your faithful dog has been kidnapped by the malicious cult.

Use your special ability to swap your limbs to fight back against the cult leader Connor and rescue your dog.

Features:

  • Navigate levels via grappling hook
  • Slice through your enemies with pickaxes
  • Defend yourself with an unbreakable shield
  • Soar through the sky on a jetpack
  • Blast your way to victory with arm cannons!
  • Game pad support.
  • Play through 11 levels.
  • Choose from 7 unique limbs
  • Boss fight
